name: send-visee
description: timvisee/send is a community-maintained fork of Mozilla Send, a self-hosted encrypted file sharing service with expiring links. Files are end-to-end encrypted in the browser and can be shared via short URLs.
features: Encrypted file sharing: End-to-end encrypts files in the browser before upload.
Expiring links: Automatically deletes files after download count or time limit.
Password protection: Optionally secure shared files with passwords.
Large file support: Handles files up to 2.5GB with chunked uploads.
No registration: Share files without creating accounts or logging in.
Download tracking: Shows how many times a file has been downloaded.
Custom expiration: Set custom time limits from 5 minutes to 7 days.
Browser-based encryption: All encryption happens client-side for maximum privacy.
Simple interface: Clean, minimal UI focused on quick file sharing.
Mobile friendly: Works on smartphones and tablets for sharing on the go.
Self-hosted control: Full control over data storage and retention policies.
Open source: Community-maintained fork with active development and security updates.
